1371: Richolfus was born in Walker straet in 1371.
1389: Richolfus moved to Die Coninc straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Erkenradis at age 19 in 1389.
1375: Lost sibling Soeten in 1375 when Soeten was 1.
1382: Lost sibling Willem in 1382 when Willem was 1.
1391: Lost sibling Tetta in 1391 when Tetta was 22.
Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Heylewigis, at age 20.
1392: Lost sibling Ryccie in 1392 when Ryccie was 3.
Had a son with Erkenradis, Poppo, at age 21.
1397: Lost father at the age of 26.
Lost son Poppo when Poppo was 6 years old.
1399: Lost sibling Valken in 1399 when Valken was 17.
1396: Lost daughter Heylewigis when Heylewigis was 6 years old.
